import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; // Import the useCart hook to access cart data import './PaymentMethodSelection.css'; // Ensure the CSS file is linked const PaymentMethodSelection = () => { const { calculateTotalPrice } = useCart(); // Get the total price calculation function const totalPrice = calculateTotalPrice(); // Get the total price return (

Select Payment Method

{/* Display Total Price */}

Total Price: ${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}

{/* Display total price */}
{/* Container for the payment methods */}
{/* Digital Wallet Payment Option */}
{/* Credit Card Payment Option */}
{/* Fawry Payment Option */}
); }; export default PaymentMethodSelection;
